text:
Created attachment 31719
Add Android to list of platforms lacking crypt support

crypto/apr_passwd.c does not compile on Android due to lack of crypt support, so patch adds Android to the existing list of platforms lacking crypt.
creator: fredrik@fornwall.net

text:
Created attachment 31741
clean up definition of no-crypt, adding Android support
creator: trawick@apache.org

text: Does the 2nd patch work for you?
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
